title: Senior Biostatistician
description_1: Leads a team of data scientists and data engineers building pilot solutions and conducting experimental design at a Fortune 500 specialty insurance company
description_2: Leverages test-and-learn methodology, delivering pilot solutions quickly to small groups to measure value before scaling products
description_3: Prioritizes work based on customer engagement to understand pain-points and identify data-enabled solutions to suit business needs
description_4: Uses Azure DevOps for the continuous deployment of applications to production environments, experienced with establishing and maintaining VMs in Azure
description_5: Remains a hands-on developer, regularly using R, Python, Git, Databricks, etc.

title: Senior Research Analyst, Advanced Analytics & Data Science
description_2: Data science developer on an agile sprint team managing applications that prioritize and monitor incoming business submissions
description_3: Develops, maintains, and deploys machine learning models, primarily GLMs, decision trees, and dabbling in unsupervised techniques
description_4: Conducts ad hoc analysis to diagnosis trends, analyze model performance, and make business recommendations based on data and statistical tests
description_5: Co-chairman of  the Markel Veteran's Network, an Employee Resource Group (2020)

title: Research Scientist, Advanced Analytics & Data Science
description_1: Advisor to the commissioner and senior executives of an 1,800-person organization, representing the commissioner at the state legislature and senior-level meetings
description_2: Communicated agency policies to the General Assembly and Military installations

title: Senior Research Scientist, Advanced Analytics & Data Science
description_1: Served in a variety of journalism and public relations roles with the 82nd Airborne Division, U.S. Military Academy and a Special Forces unit, including two deployments to Afghanistan
description_2: Managed small, technical teams supporting high-risk training and deployments
description_3: Named Distinguished Honor Graduate and Distinguished Leader Graduate during two Army leadership training courses

title: Business School Alumni Award
description_1: Given Distinguished Alumni Award for starting an alumni meetup group to share data science trends and best practices
